name: Donation for Sexual nudity #50
detailed_description: The whole content available in game Sexual nudity is completely free for you my dear customers, but this is not free for me. I am investing real money in purchasing content to make this game better and more interesting, in increasing the number of functions, characters, customization etc. If you enjoy playing Sexual nudity and would like to support its future developing, please purchase this donation DLC. Thanks to you I will be able to reinvest money in new content.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
